title: Dutch Newspaper on Treaty of Versailles MCQ 1

content.prompt: The mention of “President Wilson’s principles” is most directly significant to understanding the editorial’s point of view about the Treaty of Versailles because of the United States president’s commitment to

choices.label: establish an international organization to prevent future conflicts
work to create nation-states for ethnic minorities that had been under imperial control
broker a peace agreement on liberal principles that would not be motivated by revenge
resist the spread of Bolshevism following the Russian Revolution

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
